intro: Catch creatures, choose your style, and conquer the quest to save your friend.
description:
Have you ever wanted to relive a cartridge-era adventure? Now’s your chance!
In Doki Monsters: Quest, you set out to find your missing childhood friend — teaming up with captured creatures, battling turn-by-turn, and pushing deeper into a dangerous open world.

Grow stronger, unlock new routes, and face off against Rangers and shady corporations that disturb the peace.

Prefer comfort with your challenge? Modern touches keep the journey smooth: fast-forward battles, optional helper tips, and a quest log that keeps your goals crystal clear. 

What the adventure offers:
- 140+ original monsters to collect, train, and evolve your strategy.
- About a 20 hour story spanning 15+ towns, plus caves, shrines, seas, and mountains.
- Turn-based battles against Rangers and corporations, with seamless overworld encounters.
- Rare-hunt post-game content and 7 alternate looks per monster (one ultra-rare!).
- Fast-forward battles, optional tips, and a clear quest log — you choose your way of playing!
- Side activities — everyone’s favorite — FISHING!
- 4 save files available in case you would like to share your world with your friends!

Sharpen your strategy, build the ultimate team, and bring a friend home!

Doki Monsters: Quest’s amazing adventure awaits you!
